items.name: Watson Museum: For Curious Souls
items.section_excerpt: The region of Saurashtra has gone from becoming the home of dozens of princely states to industrial cities. Rajkot is one such. The Watson Museum inside Jubilee Garden , which commemorates Colonel John Watson, showcases the district's colonial history along with artifacts found in sites in and around the state dating back to the Indus Valley Civilization. This makes it one of the most interesting …
items.description: The region of Saurashtra has gone from becoming the home of dozens of princely states to industrial cities. Rajkot is one such. The Watson Museum inside Jubilee Garden , which commemorates Colonel John Watson, showcases the district's colonial history along with artifacts found in sites in and around the state dating back to the Indus Valley Civilization. This makes it one of the most interesting places to visit in Rajkot. Witnessing these relics from the past takes you back in time and really helps you appreciate the long history of Gujarat.
items.location_hint: Jawahar Rd, Opp BSNL Office, Jubilee Garden, Rajkot, Gujarat 360001
query_hints: Watson Museum: For Curious Souls
Watson Museum: For Curious Souls Jawahar Rd, Opp BSNL Office, Jubilee Garden, Rajkot, Gujarat 360001
Watson Museum: For Curious Souls Rajkot

items.name: Nyari Dam: For A Refreshing Experience
items.section_title: Nyari Dam: For A Refreshing Experience
items.section_excerpt: When you want to take a break from museums, we recommend heading to Nyari Dam, a scenic Rajkot place to visit that's perfect for a picnic. It's located five kilometres from Rajkot and although frequented by tourists and locals, it still retains a peaceful ambience. The views are lovely and if you stay till evening you can catch a beautiful sunset. It is one of the most romantic tourist places in R…
items.description: When you want to take a break from museums, we recommend heading to Nyari Dam, a scenic Rajkot place to visit that's perfect for a picnic. It's located five kilometres from Rajkot and although frequented by tourists and locals, it still retains a peaceful ambience. The views are lovely and if you stay till evening you can catch a beautiful sunset. It is one of the most romantic tourist places in Rajkot for couples. In fact, you can find one of the best hotels in Gujarat here.
query_hints: Nyari Dam: For A Refreshing Experience
Nyari Dam: For A Refreshing Experience Rajkot
items.source_title: Best Places To Visit In Rajkot

items.name: Prem Mandir: Seek Prayers
items.section_excerpt: One of the most interesting destinations on our Rajkot tourist places list is Prem Mandir. Despite its name, which translates to ‘temple of love', it's a Syro-Malabar cathedral dedicated to the Sacred Heart of Jesus. The church features an amalgamation of architectural styles of different religions including domes inspired by mosques and a mosaic of Christ seated above a lotus. Aarti is also perfo…
items.description: One of the most interesting destinations on our Rajkot tourist places list is Prem Mandir. Despite its name, which translates to ‘temple of love', it's a Syro-Malabar cathedral dedicated to the Sacred Heart of Jesus. The church features an amalgamation of architectural styles of different religions including domes inspired by mosques and a mosaic of Christ seated above a lotus. Aarti is also performed. These unique aspects make the church one of the best Rajkot sightseeing places.
items.location_hint: Kalawad Road, Bishops House, Ravipark Society, Rajkot, Gujarat 360005
query_hints: Prem Mandir: Seek Prayers
Prem Mandir: Seek Prayers Kalawad Road, Bishops House, Ravipark Society, Rajkot, Gujarat 360005
Prem Mandir: Seek Prayers Rajkot

items.name: Khambhalida Caves: Unveil The Mystery
items.section_excerpt: Dating all the way back to the 4th or 5th century AD, the Khambhalida Caves are among the historic places to visit near Rajkot within 100 kms feature beautiful carvings hewn from limestone. They comprise three caves of which the central one has a chaitya. Life-size figures of Bodhisattva flank the entrance to the chaitya, one of which is Avalokiteshvara Padmapani and the other is Avalokiteshvara V…
items.description: Dating all the way back to the 4th or 5th century AD, the Khambhalida Caves are among the historic places to visit near Rajkot within 100 kms feature beautiful carvings hewn from limestone. They comprise three caves of which the central one has a chaitya. Life-size figures of Bodhisattva flank the entrance to the chaitya, one of which is Avalokiteshvara Padmapani and the other is Avalokiteshvara Vajrapani. According to the description at the site, the figures are the only known depictions of Bodhisattva Avalokiteshvara in cave architecture in Gujarat.
query_hints: Khambhalida Caves: Unveil The Mystery
Khambhalida Caves: Unveil The Mystery Khambhalida, Gujarat 360370
Khambhalida Caves: Unveil The Mystery Rajkot

items.name: Lang Library: For The Bookworms
items.section_excerpt: Bibliophiles who love the intoxicating scent of books and love being surrounded by them will find Lang Library to be one the best places to visit in Rajkot & around. It's home to Kathiyawadi and Gujarati literature, fiction and reference books. Some are written in gold on handmade paper while others are bound in old leather. There are over three lakh books here and you'll have a wonderful time exp…
items.description: Bibliophiles who love the intoxicating scent of books and love being surrounded by them will find Lang Library to be one the best places to visit in Rajkot & around. It's home to Kathiyawadi and Gujarati literature, fiction and reference books. Some are written in gold on handmade paper while others are bound in old leather. There are over three lakh books here and you'll have a wonderful time exploring them.
items.location_hint: Jawahar Road, Jubilee Rd, Rajkot, Gujarat 360001

items.name: Lal Pari Lake: For Peace
items.section_excerpt: A few kilometres from Rajkot city is Lal Pari Lake, another picturesque locale that's one of the most terrific picnic spots in Gujarat. It's among the more popular tourist places inRajkot as like Aji Dam, it attracts various migratory birds who put on quite a show.

items.name: Ishwariya Park: Enjoy The Outdoors
items.section_excerpt: Located in the city, Ishwariya Park is a popular place inaugurated in the year 2008. It is a 77 acre attraction that attracts a lot of tourists who can enjoy boating, picnic and multiple outdoor games. Best visited during autumn or spring season, if you are looking for a place to relax, then this is built for you! There is a water fountain, which is one of the major attraction inside the park.
